name: Rosemary Grennan
text: Still curbside ,but was perfect love my personal pan

name: William Lu
text: Pizza hut is always a favorite of ours, but it being Christmas eve we're giving a special shout out to the staff. Even though it was a holiday everyone was friendly, polite, and in the holiday spirit. We really liked the holiday themed attire, and it capped off our evening perfectly.

name: Mindy B
text: Very enjoyable family time.  Quick, courteous service. Lots of new options.  Great food.

name: Laura Hatten
text: Great price & yummy pizza!

name: Michael McNamara
text: Always good for a decent pizza.

name: Sue Topping
text: Good service with a smile.  The pizzas and garlic knots were delicious.

name: Mindy Swartz
text: Our server was great. She was very nice and polite. Salad bar was not fresh. Menus were absolutely dirty. They need to be wiped down regularly. The table we sat at was not cleaned off very well.

name: reba Cornstubble
text:
I love pizza hut pizza but the buffet is a different story.
The buffet dont have much of a salad bar, it has not alot of toppings for a salad besides dressings and cheese. ‚Ä¶More

text: Great customer service here! When I stopped in to pick up the online order, the pizza wasn't ready. The online order never even came through. Greeted by a really nice girl, Karissa, that gave me a discount and a free soda for waiting for the new pizza. Seems like a great family friendly place!

text: Love the delicious food! The staff is always very helpful, kind, and knows us by name. Def would choose this for a family gathering. (Already have!)

name: Todd Fodor
text: Just ordered a Hawaiian pizza and it was cold and horrible. We waited an hour an 45 minutes. Hands down worst pizza I've had in 10 years. Do you have any pride in what you deliver. The owner should be ashamed.... take accountability in what you serve the public. Disgusting!!!

text: Pizza Hut in Rock Falls is a franchise restaurant that  features a friendly staff and very competitive (read affordable) pricing. The food is average but the staff goes above and beyond to cater to their customers.
